data.name: Global Explorer Max Comfort Suitcase Pro
data.description: The ultimate travel companion for the modern adventurer. Made with a durable, scratch-resistant shell and ultra-smooth spinner wheels, the Global Explorer Max makes navigating busy airports a breeze.

data.name: Global Explorer Max Comfort Suitcase Pro
data.description: An identical model to our best-selling Pro series, this suitcase offers the same premium features: a durable, scratch-resistant shell and ultra-smooth spinner wheels for effortless travel.

data.name: Luxury Lightweight Travel Suitcase
data.description: Travel in style without being weighed down. Our Luxury Lightweight suitcase combines a sleek, minimalist design with an ultra-light polycarbonate frame, perfect for weekend getaways.

data.name: Urban Compact Travel Suitcase
data.description: Designed for the city traveler, the Urban Compact is engineered to maximize packing space while meeting strict carry-on regulations. Its robust construction provides stability on any surface.

data.name: Traveller's Comfort Weekender Suitcase
data.description: Your perfect partner for short trips. The Weekender is designed for maximum comfort, featuring a soft-touch handle and quiet-glide wheels for a smooth journey.

data.name: Explorer Pro Durable Suitcase
data.description: Built to withstand the rigors of any journey. The Explorer Pro features a reinforced, impact-resistant shell and heavy-duty zippers, a choice for adventurers who demand reliability.

data.name: Deluxe Weekender Travel Suitcase
data.description: Elevate your weekend travels with the Deluxe Weekender. It boasts a premium finish and a thoughtfully designed interior with a dedicated laptop sleeve and multiple organizational compartments.

data.name: Compact Lightweight Traveller's Suitcase
data.description: Mobility meets practicality in this compact and lightweight suitcase. It's an ideal carry-on for budget airlines with stricter size limits, without sacrificing essential packing space.

data.name: Explorer Max Expandable Suitcase
data.description: Never worry about running out of space. The Explorer Max features an innovative expandable zipper system that provides up to 25% more packing capacity for longer trips.

data.name: Luxury Durable Compact Suitcase
data.description: A perfect fusion of elegance and strength. This compact suitcase is crafted from high-grade aluminum for superior protection, while its refined design ensures you travel with a touch of class.

data.name: Global Compact Suitcase
data.description: The essential carry-on for the global traveler. This suitcase meets international size standards and features a minimalist design that is both professional and stylish.

data.name: Traveller's Elite Rolling Suitcase
data.description: Experience the pinnacle of smooth travel with the Elite Rolling Suitcase. It's equipped with our most advanced, silent-run wheel system and an ergonomic telescoping handle.

data.name: Urban Max Durable Suitcase Pro
data.description: The professional's choice for urban travel. This suitcase features a shock-absorbent shell and a dedicated padded compartment for electronics.

data.name: Explorer Kids' Lightweight Luggage
data.description: Adventure awaits! This lightweight kids' luggage is easy for little hands to pull, with a fun explorer theme that will get them excited for the journey.

data.name: Luxury Compact Kids' Luggage
data.description: For the stylish young traveler, this compact kids' luggage features a chic design with charming details. Itâ€™s lightweight and has enough space for their favorite outfits and toys.

data.name: Urban Traveler Kids' Rolling Luggage
data.description: Make travel fun for your little ones! The Urban Traveler Kids' Luggage features a playful design and lightweight construction, making it easy for children to manage their own belongings.

data.name: Comfortable Travel-Friendly Kids' Luggage
data.description: Designed with kids in mind, this luggage is both comfortable to pull and travel-friendly. It features a soft, adjustable handle and a fun, colorful exterior.

data.name: Premium Explorer Luggage Set
data.description: Be prepared for any adventure with the Premium Explorer Set. This three-piece collection is built for durability and functionality, featuring reinforced corners and all-terrain wheels.

data.name: Deluxe Family Travel Set
data.description: The complete luggage solution for family vacations. This three-piece set includes a large, medium, and carry-on suitcase, all with a unified design and smooth-rolling wheels.

data.name: Deluxe Family Travel Set
data.description: Travel together with this matching set for the whole family. Includes a large, medium, and small suitcase, each with a durable hard shell for protection.

data.name: Lightweight Compact Carry-On
data.description: Streamline your travel with this lightweight carry-on. Designed to fit in overhead compartments, it's perfect for efficient packers and frequent flyers who value mobility.

data.name: Explorer Rolling Carry-On Pro
data.description: A professional-grade carry-on for the serious traveler. The Explorer Pro features a built-in USB charging port and a padded laptop compartment for a seamless journey.
